comments:
Build: 3.0 M9

I had just switched to the Java perspective for the first time. There were
several Java editors open. I hit Ctrl+Shift+W to close all editors, then
immediately hit Ctrl+Shift+T to open a type. Before the Open Type dialog opened,
I got an error dialog with the exception below. I haven't been able to reproduce it.
